1388610.name: Party Arena: Board Game Battler Demo
1388610.description:
Party Arena is a turn based strategy board game + action packed mini games mix. Single player puzzle mode to test your wits, and multiplayer mode for 2-4 players.

This is just the demo, which only includes single player puzzle content (first 10 levels). If you like what you see, please consider buying the full version and supporting us to keep making content!
1388610.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 日语*, 韩语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*, 俄语*, 简体中文*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
